JOB RESPONSIBILITIES: Integration of user-facing elements developed by front-end developers with server side logic.Build efficient, testable, and reusable PHP modules.Responsible for writing clean, scalable/modular code through source control.Solve complex performance problems and architectural challenges.Work collaboratively with design team to understand end user requirements, to provide technical solutions and for the implementation of new software features.Design software modules that will work together to produce the desired product.Ensure completed modules provide all functionality described by application experts and meet performance guidelines.Manage and maintain company servers to keep them functioning efficiently across the network.Build dynamic, high-volume web applications using agile development methodology.Responsible for working with both back-end and front-end technologies.Responsible for API development.Ensure integration of data storage solutions.Identify and suggest various opportunities to improve efficiency and functionality.

ADDITIONAL REQUIREMENTS:
Both males and females are allowed to apply
